amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds to extend "Temporary Protected Status" to any national of El Salvador, which was initially granted to nationals of El Salvador in 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 222 (Roll no. 295).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 222 (Roll no. 295).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
